Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 57th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2014...
Traded from Philadelphia to Chicago (N) on 4/30/2015 (Going to PHI: 3B E. Longoria. Going to CHN: 3B K. Youkilis, P P. Carter Jr., C D. Geis, C R. Claar)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Houston on 7/7/2016 (Going to HOU: P P. Carter Jr., P B. Cuevas, RF B. Fothergill Jr.. Going to CHN: CF T. Cobb Jr., P O. Maul, P W. Ledezma)...
Had first career hit on 6/20/2019, off Patrick Corbin (CIN)...
Earned first career win on 4/21/2021...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/2021, going 1-0, 0.68...
Released by Houston on 6/12/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 6/12/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $350,000 per year...
Released by Baltimore on 6/19/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 6/19/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $350,000 per year...
Injured on 8/31/2022 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
